Package org.sd.io

Interface Summary
DirectorySelector Interface for selecting a directory.
FileChunk Interface for a container that is built incrementally by a FileIterator.
FileChunkFactory<T extends FileChunk> Interface for a factory to build a file chunk instance from its first file line.
FileLock.LockOperation<T>  
FileOperator Operator to apply to a file with records of type T.
FilePathIterator Interface for iterating over absolute file paths.
FileRecordIteratorFactory<T> Factory for FileRecordIterator instances.
FileSelector Interface for selecting a file.
FileUtil.LineIgnorer  
MultiFileIteratorFactory<T> Factory for MultiFileIterator instances over records of type T.
MultiPartRecord<P,R> Interface for building a multi-part record of type R, one piece of type P at a time.
MultiPartRecordFactory<P,R> Factory for MultiPartRecord instances.
MultiRecordIterator<T> Interface used to iterate over multiple records to be merged.
Publishable Interface for publishing data.
RecordIterator<T> Interface used to iterate over records of type T.
RecordMerger<T,C> Interface for merging records of type T into a single record in context C.
RecordOperator<T,C> Interface for operating on a record of type T read from a context of type C.
 

Class Summary
DataHelper General utilities for helping with messages.
DeepFile Utility class to keep track of a file in a deep directory tree, distinguishing relevant from irrelevant parts of its path.
FileIterator<T extends FileChunk> Utility for iterating over a file in consecutive "file chunks".
FileIterator.FileChunkImpl  
FileLineIterator A FileRecordIterator over each line of a text file.
FileLock<T> A class to encapsulate locking a file while reading/writing.
FileRecordIterator<T> Base class to iterate over records of type T in a file.
FileUtil Miscellaneous file utilities.
GZIPInputStreamWorkaround GZIPInputStream has a bug in which it erroneously throws a "Corrupt GZip Trailer" IOException on files > 4GB.
MultiFileIterator<T> Utility to iterate over multiple sorted file lines simultaneously, getting all equal lines according to the recordComparer with each 'next'.
MultiFileLineIterator Utility to iterate over multiple sorted file lines simultaneously, getting all equal lines according to the lineComparer with each 'next'.
NumberedFile Utility class to work with numbered files.
PersistablePublishable Base class for a publishable that will be persisted and, consequently, requires versioning.
PublishableException  
PublishableString A publishable interface wrapper around a string.
SerializablePublishable A publishable wrapper around a serializable object.
SimpleFileCollector Utility class to collect files under a common parent up to a limit.
SimpleFilePathIterator Simple implementation of the file path iterator.
 

Enum Summary
DirectorySelector.Action
